data.event: The population was 7,993 at the time of the 2010 U.S. census.

event.title: the establishment of Laurel County in 1825

data.event: Upon the establishment of Laurel County in 1825, a vote was held to provide for the new area's seat of government.
The town was founded the next year; its post office established in 1831; and its city rights granted in 1836.
The town was founded the next year; its post office established in 1831; and its city rights granted in 1836.
The town was founded the next year; its post office established in 1831; and its city rights granted in 1836.
Between the 2000 and 2010 censuses, the city annexed a significant portion of land.
